name: Hebridean Shores
preparation:
The Finnieston in Glasgow, tabbed as a gin bar in a Gin & Tonic town, puts Bruichladdich The Classic Laddie scotch to use in this light, fruity drink, topped with a floater of IPA.

Add all the ingredients except for the beer into a shaker with ice and shake.

Fine-strain into a Collins glass over ice.

Top with the beer.

Garnish with a grapefruit slice.
